name: Mortadelo y Filemón: El escarabajo de Cleopatra
name_original: Mortadelo y Filemón: El escarabajo de Cleopatra
description:
This time, the developer Alcachofa Soft takes Mort and Phil to distant Egypt, where our agents must travel there to obtain a sacred scarab located in the local museum. The mission will involve many challenges, including a visit to a large pyramid full of mazes.

A great point & click adventure where you can control Mort or Phil according to your preferences: switch between characters and choose who will perform each action
